exceptions.tactic: destruct (classic (In Formula PA x)) as [H | H].
exceptions.exn: The reference classic was not found in the current environment.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall x : Formula, In Formula PA x \/ ~ In Formula PA x

Premises:
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
PA = Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) PA6 : Ensemble Formula
In : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
Intersection_intro : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U B x -> In U C x -> In U (Intersection U B C) x
InductionSchema = fun f : Formula => exists (g : Formula) (v : nat), f = PA7 g v : Formula -> Prop
Inductive Union (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) : Ensemble U := Union_introl : forall x : U, In U B x -> In U (Union U B C) x | Union_intror : forall x : U, In U C x -> In U (Union U B C) x Arguments Union _%type_scope Arguments Union_introl _%type_scope Arguments Union_intror _%type_scope
Inductive Intersection (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) : Ensemble U := Intersection_intro : forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x -> In U (Intersection U B C) x Arguments Intersection _%type_scope Arguments Intersection_intro _%type_scope
Union_intror : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U C x -> In U (Union U B C) x
Union_introl : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U B x -> In U (Union U B C) x
Couple_l : forall (U : Type) (x y : U), In U (Couple U x y) x
Triple_l : forall (U : Type) (x y z : U), In U (Triple U x y z) x
Intersection_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection U B C u -> P u
Intersection_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection U B C u -> P u
Union_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
Union_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
Full_intro : forall (U : Type) (x : U), In U (Full_set U) x
In_singleton : forall (U : Type) (x : U), In U (Singleton U x) x
Disjoint_intro : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U), (forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> Disjoint U B C
Couple_r : forall (U : Type) (x y : U), In U (Couple U x y) y
Inductive Full_set (U : Type) : Ensemble U := Full_intro : forall x : U, In U (Full_set U) x Arguments Full_set _%type_scope Arguments Full_intro _%type_scope
Inductive Triple (U : Type) (x y z : U) : Ensemble U := Triple_l : In U (Triple U x y z) x | Triple_m : In U (Triple U x y z) y | Triple_r : In U (Triple U x y z) z Arguments Triple _%type_scope Arguments Triple_l _%type_scope Arguments Triple_m _%type_scope Arguments Triple_r _%type_scope
PA7 = fun (f : Formula) (v : nat) => close LNT (impH (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) (impH (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) (forallH v f))) : Formula -> nat -> Formula Arguments PA7 _ _%nat_scope
Inductive Couple (U : Type) (x y : U) : Ensemble U := Couple_l : In U (Couple U x y) x | Couple_r : In U (Couple U x y) y Arguments Couple _%type_scope Arguments Couple_l _%type_scope Arguments Couple_r _%type_scope
Triple_r : forall (U : Type) (x y z : U), In U (Triple U x y z) z
Triple_m : forall (U : Type) (x y z : U), In U (Triple U x y z) y
Inhabited_sind : forall (U : Type) (B : Ensemble U) (P : SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P) -> Inhabited U B -> P
Inhabited_ind : forall (U : Type) (B : Ensemble U) (P : Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P) -> Inhabited U B -> P
QArith_base.Qlt_not_eq : forall x y : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt x y -> ~ QArith_base.Qeq x y

```coq
intros x.
destruct (classic (In Formula PA x)) as [H | H].
- left. assumption.
- right. assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros x. destruct (classic (In Formula PA x)) as [H | H]. - left. auto. - right. auto.
